mapper.select: select no, type, title, divide, url, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%X-%m-%d') as datetime, hit, dept, passwd from board where board.no = #{no};
mapper.update: update board set type = #{type}, title = #{title}, dept = #{contents},passwd = #{passwd}, time = now(), url = #{url} where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board(type, divide, title, dept, nickname, `time`, passwd, hit, `like`, del_yn, url) values(#{type},(select ifnull(count(*),0)+1 from board ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where type = #{type}), #{title}, #{contents}, #{nickname}, now(), #{passwd}, 0, 0, 'N', #{url})
mapper.update: update board set del_yn = 'Y' where no = #{no};
update board set hit = (hit + 1) where no = #{no};
mapper.select: select upper(type) as type, count(*) as tot from board group by upper(type)

select *, case when b.type = 'if' then 'INFO' when b.type = 'md' then 'VIDEO' else '몰라' end as viewType, DATE_FORMAT(b.time, '%X-%m-%d') as datetime from board as b where exists (select 1 from ( (select no from board where type = 'if' and del_yn = 'N' group by no order by hit desc limit 0, 5) union all (select no from board where type = 'md' and del_yn = 'N' group by no order by hit desc limit 0, 5)) as s where b.`no` = s.no) order by hit desc

select count(*) as cnt from board as b where exists (select 1 from ( (select no from board where type = 'if' and del_yn = 'N' group by no order by hit desc limit 0, 5) union all (select no from board where type = 'md' and del_yn = 'N' group by no order by hit desc limit 0, 5)) as s where b.`no` = s.no)
